head.title: ONLINE DEBT MARKET TO BE SET UP

hedline.hl1: ONLINE DEBT MARKET TO BE SET UP

block.p: Bear Stearns, Credit Suisse First Boston, Lehman Brothers and Salomon Smith Barney said yesterday that they would start a new company to build an electronic trading system for mortgage and other asset-backed securities. The system, to be introduced late this year or by early 2001, is intended to increase liquidity and cut costs for institutions trading mortgage and asset-backed securities.

Bear Stearns, Credit Suisse First Boston, Lehman Brothers and Salomon Smith Barney said yesterday that they would start a new company to build an electronic trading system for mortgage and other asset-backed securities. The system, to be introduced late this year or by early 2001, is intended to increase liquidity and cut costs for institutions trading mortgage and asset-backed securities.
